pyB12MPS Documentation¶

pyB12MPS is a python package for interfacing with the Bridge12 Microwave Power Source (MPS) for Overhauser Dynamic Nuclear Polarization (ODNP) spectroscopy.

For detailed technical information about the MPS please visit the Bridge12 MPS website.

Current stable version: 1.0.8 (08/05/2020) ( pyB12MPS)

Features¶

  • Control the Bridge12 MPS from a terminal window (Win, Mac or Linux)

  • Server Program to initialize serial communication

  • Query/Set any commands accessible through the serial interface
